issue.title: [Rust] remove extern crate for Rust 2018
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3960](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3960). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a trivial change to remove "extern crate" definitions in lib.rs, by following new format in Rust 2018.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3960?focusedCommentId=16718260) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3125
